channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS

item.title: CVE-2021-3519|2024-08-03T17:01:07.319Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Desktop models that could allow unauthorized access to the boot menu, when the "BIOS Password At Boot Device List" BIOS setting is Yes.
